content: > for help and community join our free > fb group 1 freee version in blog 2 **papaya scarf with pockets** **difficulty** beginner **materials** ice yarns saver #4 100% dralon acrylic 200 gr 330 m 2 skeins or any weight #4 you decide hook us size j-10 6 mm yarn needle scissors measuring tape **gauge** 11 st x 8 row scarf pattern 12 st x 8 row pocket pattern **sizes** scarf 10 5 wide and 60 long pocket 7 wide x 9 tall **stitch key** chain = chain single_crochet = single_crochet st = stitch half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet yo = yarn over stay calm and crochet sandra this is an original sandra regev pattern owner / designer of sandra stitches this pattern may not be redistributed for free sale or trade but finished products are permitted to be sold with credit to this shop - enjoy 1 https //www facebook com/groups/1485811495102299 2 https //sandrastitches com/crochet-pocket-scarf-papaya/
